content: create a cozy colorful baby blanket using the classic blanket stitch in four subtle hues this crochet pattern alternates between the four colors creating a soft and textured design that s perfect for babies the blanket stitch forms a lovely dense fabric while the color changes add a playful touch making it a beautiful gift for any newborn or baby shower ideal for beginners and experienced crocheters alike this project is both easy to follow and delightfully fun to make yarn debbie bliss baby cashmerino / 50g/125m/fiber content - 55% wool/33% acrylic/12% cashmere yarn a = ecru 101 x 3 balls/skeins yarn b = mint 03 x 2 balls/skeins yarn c = mouse 309 x 2 balls/skeins yarn d = mink 64 x 2 balls/skeins total meters needed for blanket = 1 125m hook - 4 mm us g-6 crochet hook skills skill level basic this is a basic/beginner-level crochet pattern the techniques involved are single_crochet double_crochet and changing colors sizing length = 30 inches/76 cm width = 30 inches/76 cm one size baby blanket
